description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. - “Combine and Control two characters simultaneously in a post-apocalyptic abstraction of the King Arthur Legend with a haunting metaphorical overtone.” -  As Arthur the Exiled in a post-apocalyptic world, harness the powers of 4 different robotic companions, known as the “Knights of the Round” over 2 different modes, in a unique "Single-Player Co-operative" experience.
description.short: - “Combine and Control two characters simultaneously in a post-apocalyptic abstraction of the King Arthur Legend with a haunting metaphorical overtone.” -  As Arthur the Exiled in a post-apocalyptic world, harness the powers of 4 different robotic companions, known as the “Knights of the Round” over 2 different modes, in a unique "Single-Player Co-operative" experience.
